mapper.select: select `product_id`,`enterprise_id`,`enterprise_name`,`prodect_name`,`specifical`,`model`,`produt_process`,`prodect_param`,`min_price`,`max_price`,`device_name`,`month_production`,`function_remark`,`remark`,`surveyted_person_name`,`surveyted_person_position`,`full_form_time`,`survey_person_name`,`create_time`,`create_user_name`,`create_by`,`modify_time`,`modify_user_name`,`modify_by`,`delete_flag`,`administrative_division`,`urbanorrural` from eco_product where enterprise_id = #{value} LIMIT 1
